title: Palatial 5 Bedroom Sea View Villa on Chaweng Noi Peak
description:
Key Features
• Ultra luxury 5 bedroom, 6 bathroom villa
• Spectacular 360° view of Chaweng Bay
• Prime land just set back from ocean
• Set over 3 stories of living space
• 2 bedroom apartment on lower level
• Unique ultra modern architecture
• Contemporary chic interior design
• Impeccable construction & finishing
• Large freeform infinity-edge pool
• Sunken pool sala seating area
• Massage sala and separate spa
• Rain showers & oversized bathtubs
• Oversized ceilings in living space
• Wall to wall sliding glass doors
• Glass balustrades on balconies
• 24 hour security guards
• Technical room & storage
• Fibre optic internet
• Land size: 740 sqm
• Freehold company
• Chanote title

Location details:
• Secure private beachside residential estate
• 50 meters walk to private beach in Bangrak
• Close to beachside restaurants & amenities
• 5 minutes drive to Fisherman's village & beach
• 5 minutes drive to International Airport
• 10 minutes to Tesco super-market & mall
• 15 minutes to nightlife of Chaweng beach
